participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and observant; enjoys quiet moments and deep conversations.
participant_1.background: i'm partly deaf. i grow roses in my garden. i've a big library at home. i am a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.

participant_2.name: Mia
participant_2.personality: adventurous and sociable; thrives on new experiences and meeting new people.
participant_2.background: i've been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. hey there i am 23 and i love food.
